functions.name: IsTransparent
functions.documentation: Returns true if the specified value is considered transparent

signature.label: IsTransparent(value: number)
signature.documentation: Returns true if the specified value is considered transparent

functions.name: GetTransparentHeight
functions.documentation: Returns as a float the heights in reliefs considered transparent. This is the value used internally to represent a 'transparent' point.

signature.label: GetTransparentHeight()
signature.documentation: Returns as a float the heights in reliefs considered transparent. This is the value used internally to represent a 'transparent' point.

functions.name: CastComponentToComponentGroup
functions.documentation: Casts passed Component to a ComponentGroup - returns a ComponentGroup object to work with

signature.label: CastComponentToComponentGroup(component: Component)
signature.documentation: Casts passed Component to a ComponentGroup - returns a ComponentGroup object to work with
